response:
The clinical picture of subacute ataxia combined with symptoms suggestive of Area Postrema Syndrome in a young female with a history of autoimmune disease (Type 1 Diabetes/DKA) strongly suggests an inflammatory demyelinating etiology. NMOSD is prioritised due to the specific brainstem symptoms, followed by MS and MOGAD.

differential_diagnosis = ["Neuromyelitis Optica Spectrum Disorder (NMOSD)", "Multiple Sclerosis", "MOG Antibody Disease (MOGAD)", "Acute Cerebellitis", "Posterior Fossa Tumour", "Paraneoplastic Cerebellar Degeneration"]
